PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12382022-11-25,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE RITU KHULLAR, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, to be Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, with the style and title of Chief Justice of Alberta, and a member ex officio of the Court of King's Bench of Alberta; and to be Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal for the Northwest Territories and a Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal of Nunavut during her tenure of office as Chief Justice of Alberta.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of the HONOURABLE RITU KHULLAR, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, to be Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, with the style and title of Chief Justice of Alberta, and a member ex officio of the Court of King's Bench of Alberta; and to be Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal for the Northwest Territories and a Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal of Nunavut during her tenure of office as Chief Justice of Alberta.
